text: @realDonaldTrump You can't even manage the disputes, the disgusting racism and murders of ppl of color, the gun violence, or the #coronavirus here in our own Country. Your offering to mediate with the Chinese government? Your like a misguided missile. Wherever you land, something will blow up.
